skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff OR a 100% [Heal Reduction] debuff OR a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns.
skills.name: Cursed Sword
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%

Lvl. 6 Damage +10%
Lvl. 7 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Has a 50% chance of placing a [Freeze] debuff for 1 turn. Enemies killed by this skill cannot be revived.
skills.name: Mark of Fear
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Removes all buffs. Also has an 80% chance of placing a [Block Buffs] debuff for 2 turns.
skills.name: Hex
